===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A sugar-coated tablet used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to remove toxic ''heat'', to dispel ''damp'' and relieve dysuria, and to tonify the kidney in the treatment of ''damp-heat in lower energizer'' marked by ''heat'' scanty dark urine, dysuria with difficult painful urination, acute or chronic pyelitis and urinary tract infection due to ''kidney-deficiency and downward flow of damp-heat''".

Sanjin tablets have the following herbal ingredients:

!Name

|金櫻根
|-

|-

|大金香炉
|-
|Herba Lygodii
|海金沙
|-
|Herba Centellae
|积雪草
